full_summary:
# **Technology Architect - Cloud Technology Architecture**
## **Solicitation Information**
* **Solicitation Number: **2023-00510**
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-19
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-16T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** [Canadian Food Inspection Agency](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)

## **End User Information**
* **End User Entity:** [Canadian Food Inspection Agency](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Address:** 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada

## **Services Required**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking a [Technology Architect] to provide professional services on an „as and when required basis“ for the Cloud Technology Architecture domain. Responsibilities will be initiated using a task solicitation/authorization process.

**Scope of Work:**
The contract requires two (2) Level 3 Technology Architects, one (1) Level 2 Technology Architect, and one (1) Level 1 Technology Architect.

**Key Details:**
* **Contract Period:** From the date of contract to March 31, 2024 with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to two additional one-year periods.
* **Set Aside:** Open to both Indigenous and non-Indigenous businesses. However, if two or more Indigenous businesses submit a bid, then the procurement is set aside under the [Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business].

## **Classification Information**
* **GSIN: **D302A
* **Description:** Informatics Professional Services

## **Trade Agreements**
This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:
* [Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca (Canada-UK TCA)
* [Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca (CKFTA)
* [Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca (CPFTA)
* [Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca # Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca # World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* [Canadian Free Trade Agreement](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca # Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement](mailto:
